short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser Extension for Clearly Cloud Offerings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension allows users to view and manage video conferencing rooms associated with their Clearly Cloud account. 

Want a video conference for a specific meeting? No problem, Clearly Live makes it easy to associate a video conference room when creating a new calendar invite in Office365 or Gmail.
